/apps/all/NVHPC/24.3-CUDA-12.3.0/Linux_x86_64/24.3/compilers/bin/pgc++ -O3 -fPIC -tp=zen2 -acc=gpu -Minfo=accel -mp=multicore -g -O0 -gpu=ccall,debug,pinned CMakeFiles/nbody2.dir/Step2/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nbody2.dir/Step2/nbody.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nbody2.dir/Commons/h5Helper.cpp.o -o nbody2   -L/home/xkrato61/pcg/PCG-proj2/NVHPC::HOSTUTILS  -Wl,-rpath,/home/xkrato61/pcg/PCG-proj2/NVHPC::HOSTUTILS /apps/all/HDF5/1.14.3-NVHPC-24.3-CUDA-12.3.0/lib/libhdf5.so /usr/lib64/libpthread.so /apps/all/Szip/2.1.1-GCCcore-12.2.0/lib/libsz.so /apps/all/zlib/1.2.12-GCCcore-12.2.0/lib/libz.so /usr/lib64/libdl.so -lm
